categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Solo Agents were specialized members of Imperial Intelligence. They were clandestine operatives skilled in espionage, covert intelligence gathering, extraction or execution of security threats, and a myriad of other mission assignments. Solo Agents were trained to work alone and complete their mission objectives without assistance from Imperial authorities. Solo Agents also underwent specialized training, as well as having their skills enhanced through the use of mnemiotic drugs.
